REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0564 reute u f BC-COUPON-CUT-ON-KEIHANS 04-08 0089

TEXT.TITLE: COUPON CUT ON KEIHANSHIN REAL ESTATE WARRANT BOND
TEXT.BODY: The coupon on the 25 mln dlr equity warrant eurobond for Keihanshin Real Estate Co Ltd has been set at 2-1/8 pct compared with the 2-1/4 pct indication, lead manager Daiwa Europe Ltd said. The exercise price has been set at 810 yen per share which represents a premium of 2.53 pct over today's closing price of 790 yen. The exchange rate was set 146.30 yen to the dollar. The five-year deal is priced at par and guaranteed by the Sumitomo Bank Ltd. REUTER
